snippet.title: Apple hires former Newton designer to head product marketing
snippet.description: ...Lots of folks have left Apple and gone on to other successful careers, and occasionallylike Steve Jobs himselfthey come back to work for the iconic computing company. That is the case of Michael Tchao, a former Newton designer, who has recently been named vice president of product marketing...

snippet.title: Rubin out, Pichai in as Google’s new senior vice president of Android
snippet.description: ...Google announced that Sundar Pichai has been instated as senior vice president of Android at Google. He'll take over the role from former Senior Vice President of Mobile and Digital Content Andy Rubin.The pace of innovation has never been greater, and Android is the most used mobile operating...
